fontTheory.description: The typography system is designed to be professional, clear, and easily readable for a resume/CV.
fontTheory.readability: The chosen fonts offer a balance between readability and formality, ensuring content is easy to scan and comprehend.
fontTheory.hierarchy: Headings are distinct in Arial for emphasis, while body text in Georgia provides a classic and elegant feel.
fontTheory.fontPairings: Arial and Georgia complement each other well, maintaining a harmonious balance between modernity and tradition.
